metadata.description: Paul Hornschemeier returns with a mosaic of genres! Comics, scripts, and prose are all on display here, including the first chapter of Hornschemeier's new graphic novel Jerkwater Elite, a Downton Abbey style screenplay, and chapter one of the Hornschemeier's first novel. "Captain All" offers a surrealist nod to comics of old and "Benny Schellfisch" brings a welcome dose of misanthropic navel gazing.
metadata.name: Forlorn Funnies, Vol. 1
